sen.j: 厚く面取りした海老芋と、1週間～10日程かけて柔らかく戻した棒鱈を、1日以上かけて炊き上げる。
sen.e: Deep peeled shrimp-shaped potatoes mixed with dried cod softened beforehand (after 7 to 10 days) are simmered for at least 1 day.

sen.j: 煮崩れしやすい芋と煮えにくい棒鱈を普通は一緒に煮ない。
sen.e: Usually, potato that boils and softens easily, and dried cod that is not easily cooked though are not put together to boil. However, the ingredient that goes out of the dried cod wraps up the shrimp-shaped potato and thus prevents it from becoming mushy easily. At the same time, the lye that comes out from the shrimp-shaped potato softens the dried cod.

Usually, the potato boils and softens easily, but the dried cod is not easily cooked though so, they are not put together to boil. However, the ingredients that seep out of the dried cod covers up the shrimp and potato mixture preventing it from becoming mushy. At the same time, the juices that from the shrimp-shaped potato softens the dried cod.
The potato boils and softens easily, but the dried cod is not easily cooked through; so, usually they are not put together to boil.
